## Vector3.FromFloatsToRef() method

Sets the given vector "result" with the given floats.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static FromFloatsToRef(x: number, y: number, z: number, result: Vector3): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | <code>number</code> | defines the x coordinate of the source |
|  y | <code>number</code> | defines the y coordinate of the source |
|  z | <code>number</code> | defines the z coordinate of the source |
|  result | <code>Vector3</code> | defines the Vector3 where to store the result |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
